itunes:title: Episode 330 - DB Sports Companion Show 10/16/18 - Live From Pittsburgh!
title: Episode 330 - DB Sports Companion Show 10/16/18 - Live From Pittsburgh!
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Holloway go live from the Western PA Drinkin' Bros Chapter and give their picks for the upcoming NBA season, what Nick Bosa leaving Ohio State does to their National Championship hopes, and who their picks are for this weekend's NF...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Holloway go live from the Western PA Drinkin' Bros Chapter and give their picks for the upcoming NBA season, what Nick Bosa leaving Ohio State does to their National Championship hopes, and who their picks are for this weekend's NFL and College Football games.

Ross Patterson and Dan Holloway go live from the Western PA Drinkin' Bros Chapter and give their picks for the upcoming NBA season, what Nick Bosa leaving Ohio State does to their National Championship hopes, and who their picks are for this weekend's NFL and College Football games.
